reason: The agent successfully launched the Bilibili application and searched for '美食'. Although it initially searched for "cats" due to the pre-existing text in the search bar, it was able to overwrite that. However, the agent was unable to find and play the video with the specific title provided in the task prompt. It chose the first video in search results, which was not the target video. Furthermore, after the initial loading failure of the video, the task was not successful.
